Bane (K1 [Thief Of Five Fates] Ench): R30' 3 targets suffer -1d4 on attacks and saving throws (Cha neg) for conc or 1 min
Bestow Curse (K3 [Sign Of Ill Omen] Necr): Touched suffers choice of Disadv on specified ability rolls, Disadv on attacks on self, require Wis save to take any action, or +1d8 HP necrotic from self attacks (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Chill Touch (K0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd

Sacred Flame (C0 Evoc): R60' Target suffers 4d8 HP radiant (Dex neg)
Slow (K3 [Mire The Mind] Tran): R120' 6 targets in 40' cu suffer half Speed, -2 AC and Dex saves, and 1 action/rd (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Spare The Dying (K0 [Among The Dead] Necr): Touched creature becomes stable
Speak With Animals (K1 [Beast Speech] Divi): Self talks to animals for 10 min
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects for 1 min
